attributes.action: inclusion does not always work for autistic children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My 4 year old child is being moved from one school to another to avoid getting a statement of special needs. each school is saying they cant cope and yet wirral education department are not interested in assessing untill he has completed a term in one school the system is not working and its our children that are suffering
please sign if you think the inclusion sytem should be looked into and changed

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
